brewery.brewery_description: Sociedade Central de Cervejas (Sociedade Central de Cervejas e Bebidas, S.A.) is a Portuguese brewery, founded in 1934. Its main output is the Sagres brand of beers. The company has been controlled by Heineken since April 2008.

items.checkin_comment: A decent basic beer. Nothing to write home about but if someone hands you one, I’d say drink it.

beer.beer_description:
Sagres is the leading and most preferred Portuguese beer. Launched in 1940, it has been since then produced with 100% natural products and according to traditional brewing methods using water, malt, non-malted cereals and a careful selection of hops. No additives or preservatives are used.
Sagres beer can be described as a mildly bodied pilsner, with a dry clean palate and a mildly bitter character, complemented by subtle estery notes. 

More info:
www.sagres.pt
#cervejasagres

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 90 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 19! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 20 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 5!

Once you’ve had just one, there’s no doubt you’ll be saying "I'll be bock" for another. That's 5 different Bock beers. Try 5 more for Level 2! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: The power of pilsner! Part of our first round of “Super Style” badges in 2023, celebrate this crisp, clean lager, which ranked as the 10th most checked-in style of 2021 with over 1M check-ins. AVAILABLE ONLY TO UNTAPPD INSIDERS.

Sagres beer can be described as a mildly bodied pilsner, with a dry clean palate and a mildly bitter character, complemented by subtle estery notes.

www.sagres.pt
#cervejasagres

A different beer with an intense fruity aroma, a rich and complex taste, soft bitter, full body, creaminess mouthfeel and red brown colour.
Excellent for food pairing.

More info:
www.sagres.pt
#cervejasagres

A dark beer with medium body, bitterness and carbonation balanced and a nice creaminess and roasted notes.

More info:
www.sagres.pt
#cervejasagres

Medium bodied beer and fruit juice drink , with a straw-yellow colour, mildly opaque. In the palate,
a gentle citric taste and odour, and a good acid/sweet balance, giving it a very high drinkability.
This product has a natural turbidity. Possible formation of deposit.

More info:
www.sagres.pt
#cervejasagres
A soft flavor beer, mildly color and bitter, slightly carbonated with a light and dry character.
A pilsner light and refreshing beer with a balanced finish, and good drinkability.
German Style Pilsener

Uma cerveja com 0,0% de teor alcoólico de sabor frutado, com notas de banana e cereais. 
A combinação de maltes (60% malte e 40% trigo) e o processo de fabrico reduzem o sabor a mosto normalmente presente nas cervejas não alcoólicas e o lúpulo adicionado confere-lhe um amargor que equilibra a doçura e as notas frutadas.

A non-alcoholic light bodied pure malt beer, with a slightly malty “bouquet” and a special hoppy aroma. The natural ingredients associated with the non-alcoholic character make it a low caloric drink.

More info:
www.sagres.pt
#cervejasagres

Bohemia Hoppy Weiss is a light and refreshing beer, produced with a mix of barley malt and wheat malt. Very soft bitterness but a strong herbal hoppy flavor, given by dry hopping with 3 hop varieties: Hallertauer Mittelfruh, Citra and Mosaic. Recommended for pairing with light dishes and summer snacks, such as fish, seafood and salads.
A fruit shandy made with lime raspberry and blueberry
Cerveja Preta de estilo Stout com 0.0% de álcool, leve, com uma espuma estável, notas de malte e café, e um bom equilíbrio entre o amargo e o doce.

Em 2006 foi lançada a Sagres Bohemia 1835, com um teor de álcool de 6,6%, numa edição limitada para comemorar os 170 anos da Cervejaria da Trindade.

Uma cerveja de forte caracter. Mais intensa a com o aroma frutado da Sagres Bohemia. Uma complexidade de sabores aperfeicoados para respeitar a tradicao.
